comment: I may not be omnipotent but I can actually see into the future.  Amber Heard is a known drug addict and big party girl.  She is also known to be an outright liar.  My prediction:  I see the next Mommy Dearest novel in about 15 years if Heard is allowed to keep this poor child.  Not only that but the poor little thing is already being used as her puppet to manipulate the press into steering the news to her baby and her "I'm just so wonderful" manipulations.  She is so self-obsessed that she is becoming a borderline psychopath.  So be afraid ... be VERY afraid for that child because the same angry tantrum outbursts that were leveled upon Depp will now be re-directed toward the future child.  How is she suppose to deal with a celebrity spoiled child's tantrums when she can't even keep her own tantrums in check?  (PS.  I am a CPTSD survivor myself and I see the same traits that my family member possessed).
